Leaves: Bluish green blades 1 cm wide, hairy, flat or folded with pointed tops.
FruitSeeds: Heads are dense and cylindrical with clusters of white bristles making them look fluffy.
DistinguishingFeatures: Very similar to other *Cenchrus* species. Dense tussocks and fluffy heads may help distinguish it.
Impacts: Increases fire risk, inhibits native species, reduces biodiversity, affects Indigenous land use.
